house_listing.house_description: Bring your fussiest buyer! 3 bedroom ranch hasall the extras and is in move-in condition.Neutral decor. New roof, new 2 car garage &new driveway in '92. Updated kit. & bath. Fin.rec. room in bsmt. w/full bath & 2nd kit.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Fenced, Ranch Style
